text: in dplyr I often use `groupby(...) %>% summarise()` to get a table of the unique combinations of hte grouping variables.  is there something analogous with DataFrames?

elements.text: to get a table of the unique combinations of hte grouping variables.  is there something analogous with DataFrames?

text:
Probably got some answers in the other thread but the way I have done it as an R dplyr user is
 `combine(groupby(data,[:idcol1,:idcol2]),:col => mean =>:meancol, :col => var => :varcol)`
